00412 inline SISO::SISO()
00413 {
00414     tail = false;
00415     MAP_metric = "maxlogMAP";
00416     MUD_method = "sGCD";
00417     scrambler_pattern = "0";//corresponds to +1 using BPSK mapping
00418     prec_gen = "1";
00419     demapper_method = "GA";
00420     Viterbi_win_len = 20;//should be set according to the generator polynomials
00421     SOVA_scaling_factor = 0.8;//set according to Wang [2003]
00422     SOVA_threshold = 10;//according to Wang [2003] an adaptive value should be used
00423     Viterbi_scaling_factor[0] = 1.4;//according to Kerner [2009]
00424     Viterbi_scaling_factor[1] = 0.4;
00425     Viterbi_hard_output_flag = false;
00426 }

00438 inline void SISO::set_precoder_generator(const int &in_prec_gen,
00439         const int &constraint_length)//set precoder polynomial
00440 {
00441     prec_gen = itpp::dec2bin(constraint_length, in_prec_gen);

00449 inline void SISO::set_generators(const itpp::ivec &in_gen,
00450         const int &constraint_length)
00451 {
00452     int nb_outputs = in_gen.length();
00453     gen.set_size(nb_outputs, constraint_length);
00454     for (int n=0;n<nb_outputs;n++)
00455         gen.set_row(n, itpp::dec2bin(constraint_length, in_gen(n)));
00456 }

00517 inline void SISO::set_scrambler_pattern(const itpp::vec &phi)
00518 {
00519     int phi_len = phi.length();
00520     scrambler_pattern.set_size(phi_len);
00521     //scrambler_pattern = to_bvec((1-phi)/2);//BPSK mapping: 0->+1 and 1->-1
00522     register int n;
00523     for (n=0;n<phi_len;n++)
00524         scrambler_pattern(n) = itpp::bin((1-int(phi(n)))/2);//BPSK mapping: 0->+1 and 1->-1
00525 }
00526 
00527 inline void SISO::set_scrambler_pattern(const itpp::bvec &phi)
00528 {
00529     scrambler_pattern = phi;
00530 }

00537 inline void SISO::set_constellation(const int &in_nb_bits_symb,
00538         const itpp::cvec &in_constellation, const itpp::bmat &in_bin_constellation)
00539 {
00540     nb_bits_symb = in_nb_bits_symb;
00541     constellation = in_constellation;
00542     bin_constellation = in_bin_constellation;
00543 }
00544 
00545 inline void SISO::set_constellation(const int &in_nb_bits_symb,
00546         const itpp::cvec &in_constellation, const itpp::ivec &in_int_constellation)
00547 {
00548     nb_bits_symb = in_nb_bits_symb;
00549     int nb_symb = in_constellation.length();
00550     constellation.set_size(nb_symb);
00551     bin_constellation.set_size(nb_symb, nb_bits_symb);
00552     for (int n=0;n<nb_symb;n++)
00553     {
00554         constellation(n) = in_constellation(in_int_constellation(n));
00555         bin_constellation.set_row(n, itpp::dec2bin(nb_bits_symb, n));
00556     }
00557 }
00558 
00559 inline void SISO::set_st_block_code(const int &Q, const itpp::cmat &A,
00560         const itpp::cmat &B, const int &N)
00561 {
00562     symbols_block = Q;
00563     nb_em_ant = A.cols();
00564     nb_rec_ant = N;
00565     block_duration = A.rows()/Q;
00566     ST_gen1 = A;
00567     ST_gen2 = B;
00568 }

00575 inline void SISO::rsc(itpp::vec &extrinsic_coded, itpp::vec &extrinsic_data,
00576         const itpp::vec &intrinsic_coded, const itpp::vec &apriori_data, const bool &tail)
00577 {
00578     set_tail(tail);
00579     rsc(extrinsic_coded, extrinsic_data, intrinsic_coded, apriori_data);
00580 }
00581 
00582 inline void SISO::rsc(itpp::vec &extrinsic_coded, itpp::vec &extrinsic_data,
00583         const itpp::vec &intrinsic_coded, const itpp::vec &apriori_data)
00584 {
00585     if (gen.size()==0)
00586     {
00587         print_err_msg("SISO::rsc: generator polynomials not initialized");
00588         return;
00589     }
00590 
00591     if (MAP_metric=="logMAP")
00592     {
00593         rsc_logMAP(extrinsic_coded, extrinsic_data, intrinsic_coded, apriori_data);
00594     } else if (MAP_metric=="maxlogMAP")
00595     {
00596         rsc_maxlogMAP(extrinsic_coded, extrinsic_data, intrinsic_coded, apriori_data);
00597     } else if (MAP_metric=="SOVA")
00598     {
00599         //no extrinsic information for coded bits is provided
00600         rsc_sova(extrinsic_data, intrinsic_coded, apriori_data, Viterbi_win_len);
00601     } else if (MAP_metric=="Viterbi")
00602     {
00603         rsc_viterbi(extrinsic_coded, extrinsic_data, intrinsic_coded, apriori_data, Viterbi_win_len);
00604     } else
00605     {
00606         print_err_msg("SISO::rsc: unknown MAP metric. The MAP metric should be either logMAP or maxlogMAP or SOVA or Viterbi");
00607     }
00608 }
00609 
00610 inline void SISO::nsc(itpp::vec &extrinsic_coded, itpp::vec &extrinsic_data,
00611         const itpp::vec &intrinsic_coded, const itpp::vec &apriori_data, const bool &tail)
00612 {
00613     set_tail(tail);
00614     nsc(extrinsic_coded, extrinsic_data, intrinsic_coded, apriori_data);
00615 }
00616 
00617 inline void SISO::nsc(itpp::vec &extrinsic_coded, itpp::vec &extrinsic_data,
00618         const itpp::vec &intrinsic_coded, const itpp::vec &apriori_data)
00619 {
00620     if (gen.size()==0)
00621     {
00622         print_err_msg("SISO::nsc: generator polynomials not initialized");
00623         return;
00624     }
00625 
00626     if (MAP_metric=="logMAP")
00627         nsc_logMAP(extrinsic_coded, extrinsic_data, intrinsic_coded, apriori_data);
00628     else if (MAP_metric=="maxlogMAP")
00629         nsc_maxlogMAP(extrinsic_coded, extrinsic_data, intrinsic_coded, apriori_data);
00630     else
00631         print_err_msg("SISO::nsc: unknown MAP metric. The MAP metric should be either logMAP or maxlogMAP");
00632 }
00633 
00634 inline void SISO::equalizer(itpp::vec &extrinsic_data, 
00635                const itpp::vec &rec_sig, 
00636                const itpp::vec &apriori_data,  
00637                const bool &tail 
00638               )
00639 {
00640     set_tail(tail);
00641     equalizer(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00642 }
00643 
00644 inline void SISO::equalizer(itpp::vec &extrinsic_data, const itpp::vec &rec_sig,
00645         const itpp::vec &apriori_data)
00646 {
00647     if (impulse_response.size()==0)
00648     {
00649         print_err_msg("SISO::equalizer: channel impulse response not initialized");
00650         return;
00651     }
00652     if ((impulse_response.size()==1)&&(prec_gen.length()==1))
00653     {
00654         print_err_msg("SISO::equalizer: flat fading channel and no precoder. Use the soft output of the channel (no need for a priori information)");
00655         return;
00656     }
00657 
00658     if (MAP_metric=="logMAP")
00659         equalizer_logMAP(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00660     else if (MAP_metric=="maxlogMAP")
00661         equalizer_maxlogMAP(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00662     else
00663         print_err_msg("SISO::equalizer: unknown MAP metric. The MAP metric should be either logMAP or maxlogMAP");
00664 }
00665 
00666 inline void SISO::mud(itpp::mat &extrinsic_data, const itpp::vec &rec_sig,
00667         const itpp::mat &apriori_data)
00668 {
00669     if (impulse_response.size()==0)
00670     {
00671         print_err_msg("SISO::mud: channel impulse response not initialized");
00672         return;
00673     }
00674     if (impulse_response.rows()!=apriori_data.rows())
00675     {
00676         print_err_msg("SISO::mud: channel impulse response must have the same number of rows as a priori info.");
00677         return;
00678     }
00679 
00680     if (MUD_method=="maxlogMAP")
00681         mud_maxlogMAP(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00682     else if (MUD_method=="GCD")
00683         GCD(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00684     else if (MUD_method=="sGCD")
00685         sGCD(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00686     else
00687         print_err_msg("SISO::mud: unknown MUD method. The MUD method should be either maxlogMAP, GCD or sGCD");
00688 }
00689 
00690 inline void SISO::demapper(itpp::vec &extrinsic_data, const itpp::cvec &rec_sig,
00691         const itpp::vec &apriori_data)
00692 {
00693     if (c_impulse_response.size()==0)
00694     {
00695         print_err_msg("SISO::demapper: channel impulse response not initialized");
00696         return;
00697     }
00698     if ((constellation.size()==0) || (bin_constellation.size()==0))
00699     {
00700         print_err_msg("SISO::demapper: constellation not initialized");
00701         return;
00702     }
00703     if (MAP_metric=="logMAP")
00704         demodulator_logMAP(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00705     else if (MAP_metric=="maxlogMAP")
00706         demodulator_maxlogMAP(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00707     else
00708         print_err_msg("SISO::demapper: unknown MAP metric. The MAP metric should be either logMAP or maxlogMAP");
00709 }
00710 
00711 inline void SISO::demapper(itpp::vec &extrinsic_data, const itpp::cmat &rec_sig,
00712         const itpp::vec &apriori_data)
00713 {
00714     if (c_impulse_response.size()==0)
00715     {
00716         print_err_msg("SISO::demapper: channel impulse response not initialized");
00717         return;
00718     }
00719     if ((ST_gen1.size()==0) || (ST_gen2.size()==0))
00720     {
00721         print_err_msg("SISO::demapper: Space-Time generator polynomials not initialized");
00722         return;
00723     }
00724     if ((constellation.size()==0) || (bin_constellation.size()==0))
00725     {
00726         print_err_msg("SISO::demapper: constellation not initialized");
00727         return;
00728     }
00729 
00730     if (demapper_method=="Hassibi_maxlogMAP")
00731         Hassibi_maxlogMAP(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00732     else if (demapper_method=="GA")
00733         GA(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00734     else if (demapper_method=="sGA")
00735         sGA(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00736     else if (demapper_method=="mmsePIC")
00737         mmsePIC(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00738     else if (demapper_method=="zfPIC")
00739         zfPIC(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00740     else if (demapper_method=="Alamouti_maxlogMAP")
00741         Alamouti_maxlogMAP(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00742     else
00743         print_err_msg("SISO::demapper: unknown demapper method. The demapper method should be either Hassibi_maxlogMAP, GA, sGA, mmsePIC, zfPIC or Alamouti_maxlogMAP");
00744 }
00745 
00746 inline void SISO::print_err_msg(const std::string &msg) const
00747 {
00748 #ifdef mex_h
00749     mexErrMsgTxt(msg.c_str());
00750 #else
00751     std::cout << msg << std::endl;
00752 #endif
00753 }
00754 
00755 inline double threshold(const double &x, const double &value)
00756 {
00757     if ((x>value)||(x<-value))
00758         return (x>0?value:-value);
00759     return x;
00760 }
00761 
00762 inline itpp::vec threshold(const itpp::vec &in, const double &value)
00763 {
00764     itpp::vec out(in.length());
00765     register int n;
00766     for (n=0;n<in.length();n++)
00767         out(n) = threshold(in(n), value);
00768     return out;
00769 }
00770 
00771 inline itpp::mat threshold(const itpp::mat &in, const double &value)
00772 {
00773     itpp::mat out(in.rows(),in.cols());
00774     register int n;
00775     for (n=0;n<in.rows();n++)
00776         out.set_row(n, threshold(in.get_row(n), value));
00777     return out;
00778 }
00779 
00780 }
00781 
00782 #endif /*SISO_H_*/
